alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Logan; Madison; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 19 at 4:53PM EST until January 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EST FOR CHAMPAIGN...SOUTHEASTERN LOGAN AND NORTHEASTERN CLARK COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO...NORTH CENTRAL MADISON AND SOUTHWESTERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO... At 453 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Urbana, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Marysville, Urbana, West Liberty, Mechanicsburg, North Lewisburg, Choctaw Lake, Harmony, Milford Center, South Vienna, Tremont City, Woodstock, Catawba, Unionville Center, Mutual, Cable, Raymond, Westville, Broadway and Rosedale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
